product_name: Vapur Element Water Bottle - 24 fl. oz.
long_description: Weighing in at 1.3 oz., the Vapur Element 24 fl. oz. water bottle is about 1/4 the weight of a 24 fl. oz. hard-plastic water bottle and it folds down when empty to take up little space in your pack. Patented flexible design is lighter and easier to hold than a rigid plastic bottle, and it folds flat when empty to fit compactly in your backpack. Durable three-ply construction allows the bottle to be folded and frozen without damage. Polyethylene/nylon construction with antimicrobial lining won't impart tastes or odors to your water. Water-tight cap has a flip-top opening for easy sipping. Comes with a plastic accessory carabiner so you can clip the bottle to a backpack strap; carabiner easily attaches to and removes from the cap. Vapur Element 24 fl. oz. water bottle is 100% BPA free; dishwasher safe.
short_description: Weighing in at 1.3 oz., the Vapur Element 24 fl. oz. water bottle is about 1/4 the weight of a 24 fl. oz. hard-plastic water bottle and it folds down when empty to take up little space in your pack.
